info.name: Darkplaats v0.6.0 (Marktplaats)
info.description:
A dark theme for Marktplaats covering most parts of the website.
Also removes all ads and sponsored content.
info.additionalInfo:
v0.6.0
fixed message screen, removed more ads, updated due to marktplaats changes

v0.5.1
fixed some bugs due to updates of Marktplaats

v0.5.0
fixed search results color

v0.4.9
fixed a few issues

v0.4.8
fixed updated bid textarea and description of item iframe

v0.4.7
fixed bugs for the bid messages and some premium content when having ad-block plus enabled

v0.4.6
rework on everything. works for most things, some bugs are currently being fixed

v0.3.3
fixed category colors, removed some ads, contemplating to remove all main content on main page

v0.3.2
fixed stuur een bericht page

v0.3.1
fixed map style

v0.3
fixed some colors due to marktplaats update

v0.2
improved messaging app page
